amendment.description: To require certain evaluations by the Secretary of Commerce and the Director of the Office of Management and Budget before the satellite acquisition program of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration may proceed.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3216 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3216 proposed by Senator Mikulski. (consideration: CR S12707-12708; text: CR S12707) To require certain evaluations by the Secretary of Commerce and the Director of the Office of Management and Budget before the satellite acquisition program of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration may proceed.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3216 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3216 proposed by Senator Mikulski.
